errors.error_description: The installation instructions unnecessarily ask the user to install `numpy` and `scipy` manually, when they are dependencies that pip will handle automatically.
correction_candidates: Remove the `pip install numpy scipy` command.
Add a note explaining that `numpy` and `scipy` are installed automatically as dependencies.
Change the commands to `pip install sectionproperties[all]`.
Combine the commands into one line: `pip install numpy scipy sectionproperties`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the `pip install numpy scipy` command.
